mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM connection_game WHERE from_member_id = #{friendId} AND to_member_id = #{memberId} AND (TRUNC(created_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) OR TRUNC(created_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1) AND is_matched = 0) > 0 THEN 'FRIEND_REQUESTED' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM connection_game WHERE from_member_id = #{memberId} AND to_member_id = #{friendId} AND (TRUNC(created_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) OR TRUNC(created_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1) AND is_matched = 0) > 0 THEN 'USER_REQUESTED' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM connection_game WHERE ((from_member_id = #{friendId} AND to_member_id = #{memberId}) OR (from_member_id = #{memberId} AND to_member_id = #{friendId})) AND TRUNC(created_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND is_matched = 1) > 0 THEN 'GAME_PLAYED' ELSE 'NO_GAME_TODAY' END AS gameStatus FROM dual
